<p> AudioClip provides audio data used by parent Sound nodes. </p> <p> X3D Tooltips of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#AudioClip" target="_blank">AudioClip</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#MovieTexture" target="_blank">MovieTexture</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#Sound" target="_blank">Sound</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/Architecture.html" target="_blank">X3D Specification</a> sections of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/sound.html" target="_blank">16 Sound component</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/sound.html#AudioClip" target="_blank">16.4.1 AudioClip</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/texturing.html#MovieTexture" target="_blank">18.4.2 MovieTexture</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/sound.html#Sound" target="_blank">16.4.2 Sound</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dResources.html#Examples" target="_blank">X3D Examples Archives</a> of related interest: </p> <ul> <li> VRML 2 Sourcebook:&nbsp; <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/Vrml2Sourcebook/Chapter17Textures" target="_blank">Chapter 17, Textures</a> and <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/Vrml2Sourcebook/Chapter24Sound" target="_blank">Chapter 24, Sound</a> </li> <li> X3D for Web Authors: <a href="http://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForWebAuthors/Chapter05AppearanceMaterialTextures" target="_blank">Chapter 5, Appearance Material Textures</a> and <a href="http://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForWebAuthors/Chapter12EnvironmentSensorSound" target="_blank">Chapter 12, Environment Sensor Sound</a> </li> </ul>
